    • Method Detail

      • doBasicSystemInit

        public static IOException doBasicSystemInit(File dbLocation)
                                     throws Exception
        Performs the basic init of ISAAC related applications. Configures SLF4J Logging, configures the HK2 looker from OTF properly, configures the DB location paths of OTF properly.
        Parameters:
        dbLocation - - optional - if not provided - uses System properties, if set, or the defaults.
        Returns:
        - null, if no issue configuring the data store paths - otherwise - the exception that happened while configuring the datastore paths.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if some other unexpected event happens

      • configDataStorePaths

        public static void configDataStorePaths(File bdbFolder)
                                 throws IOException
        Read and Set the necessary system properties so that OTF configures itself properly, as we are still lacking proper APIs to communicate with OTF.
        Parameters:
        bdbFolder - - The folder to look in for the database files. See DBLocator.findDBFolder(File)
        Throws:
        IOException
